branchCategory.name: EX120 - Output Only
branchCategory.description: <p>Serial interface unit EX120 controls up to 16 solenoid outputs and is compatible with series SV1000/2000/3000/4000, VQ1000/2000, SX3000/5000 and SY3000/5000 valves.  Available protocols include, but are not limited to DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, CC-Link, and AS-i.</p>

branchItem.name: EX120/121/122, SI Unit, Integrated Type for Output
branchItem.description: <p>Serial interface unit EX120 controls up to 16 solenoid outputs and is compatible with series SV1000/2000/3000/4000, VQ1000/2000, SX3000/5000 and SY3000/5000 valves.  Available protocols include, but are not limited to DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, CC-Link, and AS-i.</p>

branchItem.name: EX123/124/126, SI Unit For Output
branchItem.description: <p>Serial interface unit EX120 controls up to 16 solenoid outputs and is compatible with series SV1000/2000/3000/4000, VQ1000/2000, SX3000/5000 and SY3000/5000 valves.  Available protocols include, but are not limited to DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span>, PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, CC-Link, and AS-i.</p>
